/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the daily life and movement in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
